Hypenotic The Jekyll Butler

Hypenotic’s New Hire!

30 Jun 2011

I’m sure you’ve heard the theory that people hire people who are like themselves.

Of course this can have all kinds of negative consequences–glass ceiling, racism, “Old Boys Club” kind of issues.

But in our case it’s resulted in an incredibly serendipitous event. We hired someone who looks just like Barry–except she’s female, younger, harrier and comes from Mexico, not Montreal.

Check out this picture of Barry and our new Senior art director Angélica Ramos and tell me–does she not look just like Barry (but of course in a female kind of way)?

She starts in September but you can get to know her now by following her blog where she creates a new album cover for a song she chooses every day.

As my Yiddish grandmother would say, they’re both Shayna Punim–such pretty faces.
